entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:55 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:55 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:55 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
